summary: Top scientists want to build a nuclear bomb-powered spaceship to visit Mars and the planets.
cast: Jaromir Astl|Jeremy Bernstein|Arthur C. Clarke|Ed Creutz|Freeman Dyson|George Dyson|Edward B. Giller|Jonathan Kydd|Thomas Macken|Harris Mayer|Donald I. Prickett|Johndale Solem|Theodore B. Taylor|David Weiss
title: To Mars by A-Bomb: The Secret History of Project Orion
